welcome_message_body: Welcome to Maple Shade, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this wonderful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Wings Field Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network.
